name: @waddlesplash
body:
I'm @waddlesplash, an open-source enthusiast who uses C++ (+Qt), PHP, and some JavaScript to write great software for the OSS community. Most of my stuff is media-related (like [Raging MIDI](https://github.com/waddlesplash/ragingmidi)) but I'm increasingly doing graphics-related stuff too.

You can find me on Twitter too, as [@waddlesplash](http://twitter.com/waddlesplash).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
